name: Volclipse
printed_effect:
This Volclipse gets +1 {attack} for each different title
among Lunar Phase in your Underworld. You
can shuffle 8 Lunar Phase with different titles
from your Underworld into your deck in order to
return an opponent's field to their hand.
effect: This Volclipse gets +1 {attack} for each different title among Lunar Phase in your Underworld. You can shuffle 8 Lunar Phase with different titles from your Underworld into your deck in order to return an opponent's field to their hand.
